mapper.select: select ID, ACCOUNT, PASSWORD, NAME, EMAIL, MOBILE, 0 as LOGINTYPE, STATUS as LOGINSTATUS, 1 as USERTYPE, '' as QYBM, '' as SSDW, '' as SSBM from DS_COMMON_USER where ACCOUNT=LOWER(#{account})
mapper.update: update DS_COMMON_USER set PASSWORD=#{password} where ACCOUNT=#{account}
mapper.select: select ID, ACCOUNT, PASSWORD, NAME, EMAIL, MOBILE, 2 as LOGINTYPE, STATUS as LOGINSTATUS, USERTYPE, QYBM, SSDW, SSBM from DS_EP_USER where ACCOUNT=LOWER(#{account})
